item.title: Ruby on Rails Installation
item.description: Introduction Ruby on Rails is being used for some of most of relevant companies in the world, such as Git Hub, AirBnb, Groupon, Hulu, etc. In addition, there is a high demand for Ruby on Rails on the labor market for web back-ending development. However, there are some languages in the market where you must take into account, before considering to use Ruby in your project. Here are some Advantages and Disadvantages of developing on Ruby on Rails :
